content:
# I've successfully moved to the nearest stone resource patch. 
# Now, I will attempt to harvest stone from this new location.

# I will try to gather a quantity of 20 stone from this patch.
harvested_stone = harvest_resource(nearest_stone_position, quantity=20)
print(f'Attempting to harvest {harvested_stone} stone from the patch.')

# After harvesting, I will check my inventory to confirm the amount of stone collected.
print(f"Updated inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
